items.quote: Everything you want to be, you already are. You're simply on the path to discovering it.
Do no harm, but take no crap.
Never underestimate your problem or your ability to deal with it.
Other people's opinion of you does not have to become your reality.
Fear, uncertainty and discomfort are your compasses toward growth.
Until you cross the bridge of your insecurities, you can't begin to explore your possibilities.
Be careful how you are talking to yourself because you are listening.
If you want to look good in front of thousands, you have to outwork thousands in front of nobody.
Once a year, go some place you've never been before.
Do not discourage yourself with what you haven't done, encourage yourself with what you will do.
It's not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.
Overthinking ruins you. Ruins the situation, twists it around, makes you worry and just makes everything much worse than it actually is.
Light tomorrow with today.
Wherever you go, no matter what the weather, always bring your own sunshine.
There is no such thing as failure, just lessons to be learnt on the way.
You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less.
Do small things with great love.
Forget all the reasons why it won't work and believe the one reason why it will.
Don't regret anything you do, because in the end it makes you who you are.
Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
Continuous improvement is better than delayed perfection.
The only way to learn it is to do it.
Always walk through life as if you have something new to learn and you will.
Do what you feel in your heart to be right. You’ll be criticized anyway.
Continuous effort, not strength or intelligence, is the key to unlocking our potential.
Be curious about everything. Never stop learning. Never stop growing.
When you’re curious, you find lots of interesting things to do.
There is real magic in enthusiasm. It spells the difference between mediocrity and accomplishment.
Deal with the big while it is still small.
Excuses are the rocks where our dreams are crushed.
Always do what you are afraid to do.
It's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
Do more of what makes you happy.
On your journey through life, make sure your biography has at least one extraordinary chapter.
Victory is sweetest when you've known defeat.
Do not fear to be eccentric in opinion, for every opinion now accepted was once eccentric.
Being aware of a single shortcoming within yourself is far more useful than being aware of a thousand in someone else.
Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
Nothing is so fatiguing as the eternal hanging on of an uncompleted task.
Have patience. All things are difficult before they become easy.
Everything you can imagine is real.
Shipping beats perfection.
You don't have to live your life the way other people expect you to.
Fear leads to self-doubt which is the worst enemy of creativity.
The surest way to find your dream job is to create it.
Live your dream, and share your passion.
The past has no power over the present moment.
Never let your fear decide your fate.
If most of us are ashamed of shabby clothes and shoddy furniture, let us be more ashamed of shabby ideas and shoddy philosophies.
It doesn't matter where you start. Only that you begin.
We grow fearless when we do the things we fear.
Tough times don't last; tough people do.
If you want to lift yourself up, lift up someone else.
You cannot swim for new horizons until you have courage to lose sight of the shore.
Yesterday is gone. Tomorrow has not yet come. We have only today. Let us begin.
Don’t give up trying to do what you really want to do.
Learn from the mistakes of others. You can’t live long enough to make them all yourself.
When you meet people, show real appreciation, then genuine curiosity.
It's not who you think you are that holds you back it's who you think you're not.
Tension is who you think you should be. Relaxation is who you are.
Look for something positive each day, even if some days you have to look a little harder.
It’s easier to keep up than to catch up.
Have enough courage to trust love one more time and always one more time.
Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
Use what talents you possess; the woods would be very silent if no birds sang there except those that sang best.
What gets measured gets managed.
Progress lies not in enhancing what is, but in advancing toward what will be.
Peace in the world is everybody's business, no matter where you live or what you do.
When we give up on our dreams, we die while still alive.
Victory is always possible for the person who refuses to stop fighting.
If you really believe in what you're doing, work hard, take nothing personally and if something blocks one route, find another. Never give up.
Make the most of yourself by fanning the tiny inner sparks of possibility into flames of achievement.
Ask yourself, who do you want to be? Figure out for yourself what makes you happy, no matter how crazy it may sound to other people.
The master has failed more times than the beginner has even tried.
Use the talents you possess, for the woods would be very silent if no birds sang except the best.
Rise above the storm and you will find the sunshine.
No one has the power to shatter your dreams unless you give it to them.
Know well what leads you forward and what holds you back, and choose the path that leads you to wisdom.
When you have confidence, you can have a lot of fun. And when you have fun, you can do amazing things.
Dude, suckin' at something is the first step to being sorta good at something.
Don't bury your failures. Let them inspire you.
One man or woman with courage is a majority.
Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
Breathe. Take care. Stand still for a minute. What you are looking for might just be looking for you too.
Never doubt that you are valuable and powerful and deserving of every chance in the world to pursue your dreams.
The world needs dreamers and the world needs doers. But above all, the world needs dreamers who do.
You can feel sore tomorrow or you can feel sorry tomorrow. You choose.
When you are content to be simply yourself and don't compare or compete, everyone will respect you.
Do or do not, there is no try.
Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you are right.
Winning starts with beginning.
Too many people overvalue what they are not and undervalue what they are.
What you seek is seeking you.
Dare to live the life you have dreamed for yourself. Go forward and make your dreams come true.
The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change their future by merely changing their attitude.
‎Do not seek to follow in the footsteps of others, instead, seek what they sought.
When we seek to discover the best in others, we somehow bring out the best in ourselves.
Be yourself. Everyone else is already taken.
There is no small act of kindness. Every compassionate act makes large the world.
Success isn't about how your life looks to others. It's about how it feels to you.
Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.
Take care of your body. It’s the only place you have to live.
Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths.
Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world.
The more one meditates upon good thoughts, the better will be one's world and the world at large.
The only way of finding the limits of the possible is by going beyond them into the impossible.
You got this. Make it happen.
Forgiveness is a gift you give yourself.
Bravery is the solution to regret.
There are seven days in the week and someday isn't one of them.
Your relationship with yourself sets the tone for every other relationship you have.
Those who can imagine anything can create the impossible.
Low self esteem is like driving through life with your handbrake on.
Do one thing every day that scares you.
It is more important to know where you are going than to get there quickly. Do not mistake activity for achievement.
Give thanks for a little and you will find a lot.
To understand and be understood, those are among life’s greatest gifts, and every interaction is an opportunity to exchange them.
You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
Kind words can be short and easy to speak, but their echoes are truly endless.
If you set your goals ridiculously high and it's a failure, you will fail above everyone else's success.
Obsessed is a word that the lazy use to describe the dedicated.
A pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity; an optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty.
Every day is a new beginning, take a deep breath and start again.
Know your limits but never stop trying to exceed them.
Believe in yourself. Under-confidence leads to a self-fulfilling prophecy that you are not good enough for your work.
The best way out is always through.
Your mind will take the shape of what you frequently hold in thought, for the human spirit is colored by such impressions.
Choose your heroes or they will be chosen for you.
The key is not to prioritize what's on your schedule, but to schedule your priorities.
Change your thoughts and you change your world.
Watch carefully the magic that occurs when you give a person just enough comfort to be themselves.
A person is but the product of their thoughts. What they think, they become.
Don't compare your beginning to someone else's middle.
Don't let small minds convince you that your dreams are too big.
The struggle ends when the gratitude begins.
Never underestimate the ability of a small group of dedicated people to change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has.
Nothing can dim the light which shines from within.
